attributes.additional_details: 20/12/16 I have came across a PLANNED hunt that involved a stag being carted into a field to be hunted which is in fact illegal. THE USPCA or PSNI were not Alarmed about this event which left a lot of people saddened and furious. Animals are apart of nature and we take their lives away for "fun" which is absolutely upsetting!
attributes.background: Animals including foxes and stags are the main animals that are being hunted in Northern Ireland. nature is a popular attraction in Northern Ireland as well as Ireland and this is why this so called "sport" needs to be banned!

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Northern Ireland Assembly is responsible for. 
 
If you'd like to send your petition to the Northern Ireland Assembly, you can find the contact details here: 
http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/about-the-assembly/contact-us/
